name: Prime Iron
description:
Welcome to Prime Iron, a dungeon rogue like shooter.

Your goal : Find as much treasure as you can. But it is not that simple. When you find one, everything becomes harder. But when you die, you can boost your hero to become a real god on earth.

Binds are explained at the beginning.

Assets not original : https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite
